Dialogs.Dialog: Rinko
What do you think "dating" means？
Huh？ Something happened？
I was talking to a friend of mine. I wanted to hear what Rinko's boyfriend thinks.
Well... how about the fact that we both want to be with each other forever？
It's not bad, though it's not surprising.
You don't need to be surprised. Your thoughts, ▲小早川＊▲？
I don't know. But I heard if there's a discrepancy in this answer, the couple doesn't get along, apparently.
Eh, I see. So, are we out of sync？
I thought things were going pretty well between you and Rinko, don't you？
Haha, of course！
Yes. That's what I'm talking about. Good for you.
What are you thinking, ▲小早川＊▲？
Rinko
...Something remarkable. I just remembered what my friend asked me.
About what it meant to be in a relationship.
It's hard to say... So, what do you think, ▲小早川＊▲？
Rinko couldn't answer.
Why？
Because they all say it's "a hassle" and "being constrained"...
I don't hate those answers. But it makes me sad they think that way.
Don't look so worried. Rinko doesn't think that way. It's fun to be with you, you know？
Rinko
Hey, can I ask you a question？
What's the matter.
What does it mean to be in a relationship？
Huh？ Did I do something to make you uneasy？
Not really. It's just that my friend asked me for some advice and I couldn't give a good answer.
That's easy, to be lovers. That's all you need, right？
That's so appropriate. Rinko was thinking of all kinds of difficult things.
Sorry！
Well, that no-nonsense is a good thing. I feel silly for worrying about it. You and Rinko are lovers！ Is that what you want？
Yes！
You've been spacing out for a while now. What's wrong？
Rinko
...I'm thinking.
If you have a problem, I'm here to help you, okay？
When you say thinking, it's short sighted to think you are immediately distressed.
If it's not a problem, what is it？
I'm not saying it's not a problem.
Which one！
Geez, the heart of a maiden is a complicated thing.
(A maiden's heart... How do girls think...？)
Rinko
Do you know what Rinko is thinking？
Well, if you ask me...
Hmm, so what did Rinko just think of？
Eh, now？ Hmm... I-Is it itchy behind your ears？
...Did I guess right？
Hah...
Uh... Ah, I know what you are thinking right now.
Can you say it？
...You idiot？
Correct.
(I was just kidding...)
What do girls think about？
Rinko
Is something wrong？
The other day a few girls in my class were laughing so hard, I asked them what was so funny, and they laughed without really knowing why.
Yeah, I know what you mean.
Hmm... Is the same for you, ▲小早川＊▲？
No, it's not. Understanding means being able to comprehend a phenomenon, not empathy, you know？
Uh？
I mean, those girls don't actually think about it. Sometimes there's a bad reason for a girl's tears, but there's no particular reason for her smile. This is Rinko's theory.
I see. So, that doesn't happens to you, ▲小早川＊▲.
Yes, Rinko's joys and sorrows are complicated. Do your best to unravel them♪
(Yeah, I'd like to see the answer...)
When do you get nervous ▲小早川＊▲？
Rinko
Why are you asking me？ It's suspicious.
There's nothing suspicious about it. It's the my role to make my girlfriend nervous, isn't it？
What's your take on that？
A friend of mine asked. He read in on a magazine.
That's what I thought. You aren't honest when asking about things like that.
Ah...
Well, it's okay. Rinko gets nervous when she's out alone at night.
That's not what I meant. Besides, it's not safe for you to be alone！
That's why. I'm thinking that nosy old man might try to talk to me again. It reminds me of before we started dating, and it makes me a little nervous.
When do you get nervous, ▲小早川＊▲？
Rinko
I'm not going to tell that easily. It feels like you are going to get hit.
Well, that's why I'm asking.
Is that so？ Well, that's not playing fair. Besides, I think the order of things is to start with you.
Me？ Well, I... hmm...
Come on！
It would be when I kiss you ▲小早川＊▲！
Um, should I be more specific？
Idiot！ I don't need that.
(When I say this, I must make you nervous, ▲小早川＊▲...)
Rinko
Hey, can I ask you something？
What's up？
Were you thrilled when you first met Rinko？
...I think I did. Maybe it was more excitement than pure thrill, though.
Really？
Yes. At the time, I didn't expect to end with you, ▲小早川＊▲.
Hehe, I think Rinko had a feeling earlier. Every time I saw you, my heart pounded more and more.
Your heart, huh... is it still doing the same, or has it increased？
Ah, you just got too carried away, so now you lost 10 points.
(...I wonder what the points are for.)
Rinko
Hey, which are you worse at, predicaments or chance？
Hmm, well, I don't want to be in predicaments... but I also don't want to think I can fail my chances.
Right？ In the end, I'm thrilled and not too happy either way. Normal is the best.
Sure, if I can be with you normally, that's fine, ▲小早川＊▲.
What's that prank？
But, isn't it right？
Well, maybe. I've been with you for a long time, I'm sure there will be predicaments, chances, and all sorts of things.
What's that？
I mean our future... or something... things like that！
Rinko
You know those romantic dramas that are all the rage these days？
Yeah, the girls in my class make a lot of noise about them.
They say the voice of the lead actor is very popular. I hear that just listening to it makes you nervous.
How about you, ▲小早川＊▲？
I don't know. Can you give it a try？
What？ An impersonation？
Yes, like "I came to this country to meet you." Go ahead！
Eve if you say that.
Go ahead！
"The reason why I came to Towano was to meet you, ▲小早川＊▲."
What do you think？ Did you heart flutter？
...Sucker punch！
Rinko
You know, thank you for always thinking about Rinko.
What？ What's up with the sudden change？
Why are you so surprised？
Well, you'd be surprised. It was like the last episode of some kind.
Like Rinko going back to the future？
Yes, something like that.
If you were that surprised, then it was a success. Let's give your boyfriend a thrill every now and then！ Or so I read in an add in a magazine.
...I think that's the wrong kind of thrill.
Really？
(Yeah, that's right...)
Is there something on my face？
Rinko
...I don't think it's changed after all.
Hasn't it changed？ Me？
A friend told me about it. She said you looked cooler...
Is that what they say about me？
Stop grinning. Are you that happy？
Well, that makes me happy.
It's okay. Don't get too carried away... Do you have any idea what the cause is？
If I changed, it's probably because of you. There's nothing else, ▲小早川＊▲.
What？
...Why not？ Hehe, Rinko doesn't think that's a bad thing.
Rinko
The other day, you were talking to a girl who looked like she was having a lot of fun, right？
Really？ ...I think it was a girl from my class.
...Hmm, well, okay.
Perhaps... you're jealous？
...I just wanted to confirm it.
I'm sorry, I understand. Don't look scary like that.
It seems like there are a lot of girls around you lately.
Hmm... Surely, I think I might be able to talk naturally with girls since I started dating you, ▲小早川＊▲.
Huh！ What's with that, just say it clearly.
I guess that's what a guy with a cute girlfriend can afford！
You can't afford to be like this！
Rinko
Were you browsing at the convenience store the other day？
...Yeah, I might have. Wait, you could just called me out.
Yeah, I could have.
Why didn't you？
I don't know, you just looked a little big to me.
You think I've gained weight？
No, I don't. I mean, you look a lot tougher than when you were scurrying around with a can a mackerel...
...Don't make me say embarrassing things.
Is it because of me？
Geez, I can't let him go to the convenience store at night by himself anymore.
(I never thought I would hear that from you, ▲小早川＊▲...)
Rinko
Did you peek into my classroom the other day？
I just wanted to check on you ▲小早川＊▲.
I knew it. Why didn't you just call out to me？
You were happily having lunch with a friend. I refrained.
Why not？ Don't be shy with Rinko.
I don't mean to be, but to your friends around. You seemed to be the center, and it would be bad if I took you out, right, ▲小早川＊▲？
Rinko is the center...？ I don't think so.
...Indeed, when it comes to love talk, there are times when the questions are focused on Rinko.
(So that was why they were looking at me...)
Rinko
You know... I was asked for relationship advice.
Really now, ▲小早川＊▲？
Yes, but what's your complaint？
I didn't mean that, I just thought you've changed.
Rinko did？ I wonder about it...
I didn't mean you, I meant your friends, ▲小早川＊▲.
...Well, maybe.
So, what did they ask you？
Tips on how to get along with an older boyfriend.
Huh... so, what？
I won't spoil it like that.
(...I'm curious.)
Rinko
The other day I went to your class and they were calling me your "young bride", or something like that...
...I'm sorry if they made you feel bad.
I'm fine. It's just that I'm only one step higher. Boys are still children.
I'm glad. Before you know it, the guys in my class are speaking about us, ▲小早川＊▲.
You mean like an official couple？ I don't think that's bad.
But if you get teased too much, then I...
That's fine. On the contrary, it'll seem that I am taking care of you because I am your girlfriend. You can even tell them "I'm out with a girl now."
...Ah, I see.
You won't do bad things, will you？
I won't！
Rinko
Did you see that couple earlier？ You know, the girl was in full makeup.
Yeah, it was pretty obvious.
Yeah, Rinko was also staring at them. I'm always interested in couples around the same age.
I guess that's how it is.
Isn't it？ Like, compared to ourselves.
We don't need to compare, you are my match, ▲小早川＊▲.
Eh？
What about you, ▲小早川＊▲？
For Rinko too...
Oh, you're so honest. What's up？
Forget it, I was lying. The end.
(...You took your words back.)
Rinko
The Grandpa and Grandma from before... seemed to be on good terms.
...Yeah, holding hands at that age is kind of nice, isn't it？
Yeah. I feel like I lost.
As we are now, I hope we can spend more time together. Don't you, Grandma.
Yes, Grandpa.
For a moment you looked like a Grandpa.
How was it？ How do I look as a Grandpa？
It was quite a nice romance gray hair. I might be biased though.
I see. You as a Grandma would look cute too, ▲小早川＊▲.
I hope we can be together forever.
Rinko
That couple from earlier... was amazing. I couldn't help but look at them.
Huh, those high schoolers？
...Yeah. Compared to them, you and Rinko are more mature.
That's a bad comparison, that's called an idiot couple.
Maybe.
However, if you really want a thing like that, then, ▲小早川＊▲...
No... that's not what I meant...
Isn't that the case！？
...I don't like it.
I remembered an e-mail you sent me when we had just gotten to know each other ▲小早川＊▲――
Rinko
Forget about it.
Why？ It's our precious memory. Don't you remember things like that, ▲小早川＊▲？
...Not really, though.
Right？ I think we've been together for quite a while.
Geez, I get it.
In the beginning, for example...
I said it's okay. Why do you act so childish... You acting like an old man and also a child hasn't changed even after being in a relationship.
Rinko
The longer it takes, the closer it gets - what's that？
A riddle？
Yes. My friend said she sent it to her boyfriend.
Hmm... I give up. What's the answer？
The answer is relationship. What about you and Rinko？ We've been together for a long time.
Yes, you can lose distance, not closeness.
...Hmm. So what about the closer you get, the deeper you feel？
Eh, a second question？
Yes. There's more to come.
It's like the gap between men and women. It means we need to keep an optimal distance.
(I understand...)
I've got a lot of e-mails from you. That's how long we've been together.
Rinko
...Yeah. When you read it back, does it remind you of that time？
Like when did we go on a date, what did you eat...
Yup. And... there have been some miscommunications.
...Yes, maybe？ ...I'm sorry.
You don't have to apologize.
I've never felt like we've been together for a long time, but... I might feel a little like that now.
I guess. In your terms... it's not bad, right, ▲小早川＊▲？
Hehe, that means awesome. Did you know that？
